mapper.select: SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type FROM board where is_use = 1
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type FROM board where publisher = #{userId}
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type FROM board where id = #{boardId}
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type FROM board where board_type = #{boardType} and is_use = 1
SELECT id, title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type FROM board where is_use = 1 order by id desc limit 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, regdate, publisher, contents, board_type) VALUES (#{title}, now(), #{publisher}, #{contents}, #{boardType})
mapper.update: UPDATE board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
mapper.delete: UPDATE board set is_use = 0 where id = #{id};
